metadata.entity_name: All Other Miscellaneous Electrical Equipment and Component Manufacturing

title: All Other Miscellaneous Electrical Equipment and Component Manufacturing

industry_name.value: All Other Miscellaneous Electrical Equipment and Component Manufacturing

cross_references.text: all other miscellaneous electrical equipment and component manufacturing
cross_references.name: All Other Miscellaneous Electrical Equipment and Component Manufacturing

description.value: This U.S. industry comprises establishments primarily engaged in manufacturing industrial and commercial electric apparatus and other equipment (except lighting equipment, household appliances, transformers, motors, generators, switchgear, relays, industrial controls, batteries, communication and energy wire and cable, wiring devices, and carbon and graphite products). This industry includes power converters (i.e., AC to DC and DC to AC), power supplies, surge suppressors, and similar equipment for industrial-type and consumer-type equipment.

job_tasks.value: High risk job tasks associated with this industry: Formulate, mold, or cure resins to produce advanced composite materials Use solder containing colophony, zinc chloride, ethanolamine, or ammonium chloride flux
